Has someone encountered this issue with potential data loss? https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4933 Happens here and then to me, but already for a long time. @mazze.ch I recall we chatted about it a while ago.

Unable to save page after using CKEditor "Maximize" mode 路 Issue #4933 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug Sometimes I'm not able to save a page after editing the body text in CKEditor. After hitting the "Save" button of the page edit form, the editor area changes: b...

@Olaf Grabienski I can reliably reproduce it. It only seems to be a problem when selecting an image from the library, while the editor is maximized. (I never used the editor in maximized mode before...).
Thanks, also for the feedback in the issue thread. I'm quite sure, the issue for me happened also with new uploaded images.
